nodes.text: Sadie was a female individual who was the aunt of Meeba, a male Human who served as the captain of the Galactic Republic cruiser Relentless during the Clone Wars. Sadie was known to wear undergarments and around 20 BBY, Meeba mentioned his Aunt Sadie's underwear while berating Thaereian military customs ships that were blocking the path of the Republic flotilla Strike Force Cularin in the Cularin system.
